DOC.brief_summary: This longitudinal cohort study response 3 day period control overfeed relate subsequent weight gain . We hypothesize thin individual resistant weight gain respond period overfeed increase fat oxidation , reduce food intake , increase physical activity relative gain weight time .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects Overfeeding Obesity-Prone ( OP ) Obesity-Resistant ( OR ) Women
DOC.criteria: Half subject woman , half men , age 2535 , range BMI 's 1927 , 'thin subject ' 1st degree relative BMI > 30 . Subjects engage planned physical activity 3 hr per week . For obesity prone group least 1 1st degree relative BMI > 30 .
